architectural_notes: Preview/testing link becomes active only after publishing a version; reverted versions do not automatically generate an active preview draft/link.
Preview link for the published version is accessed via the platform UI (right panel) or direct preview URL when provided (e.g., https://caffeine.icp.xyz/preview).

existing_features.title: Publish (run) Draft Version 26 so it becomes the active preview build available for testing via the standard preview link.
